review: Doctor Sunil is great Physician with excellent diagnosis. I have be consulting him for over an year for my mother after TKA procedure. He has a systematic ways to keep patient records with everything available on Healthplix app. He is available for tele-consultation on same. He has a great understanding medicine and listens well before prescribing medication. Even his prescription clearly mentions what medicine is being given for what complain. With level details and clarity, it is so much easier to understand the prescription and communicate with doctor. Dr. Sunil is our go to physician as first line of defense and would definitely recommend him. Thanks a lot Doctor.
reply_text:
Thank You for your appreciations. Happy to have guided your mother to be in good health.
Take care

review:
A doctor with a rare combination of specialty which worked well for my father.
He explains the issues, method of analysis and treatments in the most simplest way.
Available at all times through the mobile application which is very convenient for quick chats, uploading and referring to all the prescriptions and vitals. 
He reviews the vitals of both my father's and mother's within few hours and provides immediate guidance if there any change in medication.
A true doctor in all sense. Have recommended and would definitely recommend to all my contacts.
